newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-CRYSTAL PALACE BACK IN ENGLISH PREMIER LEAGUE.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-CRYSTAL PALACE BACK IN ENGLISH PREMIER LEAGUE.

text.p: A superb 90th-minute goal from midfielder David Hopkin against Sheffield United on Monday put Crystal Palace back into the English premier league after an absence of two seasons.
Hopkin's goal gave Palace a 1-0 win over United in an English league play-off final at Wembley.

With the tightly-contested match heading towards extra time at 0-0, Hopkin picked up a loose ball from a corner, pulled it on to his right foot and curled it into the top corner of the United goal from 20 metres.
Palace's success made up for the disappointment of last season, when they lost 2-1 to Leicester in the corresponding match thanks to a goal in the last minute of extra time.
